replies.bodyText: deploymentGroupToRootPackages is used to update the GROUP_TO_ROOT_COMPONENTS_TOPICS which contain all the root component to group mappings. This is updated during deployment.
replies.author: nikkhilmuthye

timeline.bodyText:

componentsToGroupsTopics:

    <deploymentConfigArn>: <groupName>
